Most probably, this has been caused by the new code in TreeViewer that returns a TreeSelection (implements IStructuredSelection) instead of a StructuredSelection.

Not sure how this was fixed, but I believe many clients assume that the selection from structured viewers is a StructuredSelection, not just an IStructuredSelection.  Although this is an incorrect assumption, they can be forgiven for getting it wrong because getSelection() is just typed to return an ISelection.
